# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a strongly-typed file handle from a raw C file handle.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: CInt)
```

## Creating a File Descriptor

- **rawValue**: The raw C file handle.
title: init(rawValue:)
